config.message_text:
*Good morning!* It's 10:30am – _time to take a short break_.

Now would be a good time to take a few minutes to:
• drink some water:potable_water:
• take a short walk:woman-walking::skin-tone-6:
• play with a pet :dog:

Did you do something fun or have:bulb:ideas for healthy tips to share with others? Add them in a thread!
